summary.description:
Today, drier conditions in outside humidity (down 9%) and rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 729 m), feels like temperature (up 1.7°C), and inside temperature (up 1.8°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 770.9m higher than yesterday, 135.7m lower than the past week, 728.7m lower than the past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 765m and a peak of 2220m, averaging 2040m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.
cloud levels.summary: The clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, a muggy, humid atmosphere is likely. Drizzle or light rain possible, the clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected, and sunlight levels will peak at very high intensity. Weather could become unsettled.
